name: Breathe (itch) (bonjourcyn, Stephanie Glover, indigobel, Liktoria, adelerichards, piiyne)
name_original: Breathe (itch) (bonjourcyn, Stephanie Glover, indigobel, Liktoria, adelerichards, piiyne)
description:
A 2.5D side-scrolling survival platformer. 

Following a global oxygen crisis that compromised the atmosphere, humanity must harvest a super plant on the planet Ceres in order to ensure their survival.

After a harvesting mission goes south on Ceres, Roanoke Taylor is tasked with rescuing the crew’s lone survivor - her twin brother and bringing the harvest back to humanity’s mobile space station to ensure the world’s continued survival. 

Play as Roanoke and beware of the lethal atmosphere of Ceres, the hazardous terrain, and the animal inhabitants that don’t take kindly to anything or anyone leaving their planet.

Controls: 

A,D or Arrows - Move

Spacebar - Jump

I - Inventory

ESC - Pause

Left Mouse Button - Shoot

Created for the Women In Games Jam 2021! The Women in Games Jam 2021 - itch.io

Team 6
